section.name: The DynIncludes page
section.p: The left frame lists all dynamic includes used in your product. Select such a dynamic include from the list for editing.

tr.td: Box No. 1 shows the branch options to create or delete product specific branches.
Box No. 2 displays the whole content of the current dynamic include.

section.name: The EditorApplet of the Pustefix editor
section.p: This is the EditorApplet. It works for dynamic includes in the same way as for includes explained in the Includes page.
